text: Sir Charles Christian Nicholson, 3rd Baronet (b 15 December 1941) is a British peer.‘NICHOLSON, Sir Charles Christian’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2016; online edn, Oxford University Press, 2014 ; online edn, April 2014 accessed 30 Aug 2016 He is the older son of Sir John Norris Nicholson, 2nd Baronet and Vittoria Vivien née Trewhella: he has one brother and two sisters. He was educated at Ampleforth College and Magdalen College, Oxford. In 1975 he married Martha, widow of Niall Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe: he has one step son and one step daughter. ==Notes== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Cheshire Regiment officers Category:People educated at Ampleforth College Category:Alumni of Magdalen College, Oxford
title: Sir Charles Christian Nicholson, 3rd Baronet
